name: Learn with WordFriends Fully Unlocked
description:
Learn with WordFriends is the exciting new educational game from WordWorld, the Emmy-winning show seen on PBS that was funded in part by the U.S. Department of Education. Build and discover words with all of your favorite characters: Dog, Duck, Sheep, Ant, Bear, Pig and Frog.

There are three puzzles to play:

• WordRain – grab letters as they fall from the sky and put them in the appropriate place to build the word object!
• WordScramble – rearrange scrambled letters in the proper order to spell the word object!
• WordMatch – a tile memory game fun for all ages!

In addition to the puzzles, you can play with all your WordFriends on the Farm!

Important note: All WordFriends are unlocked and available to play in this version. Choose the difficulty you want for your child.

EDUCATORS: If you are a qualified educator, please purchase this version for an educator discount.
